title: Manage a Material Review Board (MRB) Action
description: A part has been manufactured with a minor deviation from the blueprint. An MRB (a team of engineers) must decide if the part is usable 'as-is', needs repair, or must be scrapped.

tasks.description: Present the non-conformance report (NCR) to the MRB, detailing the deviation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the facts of the non-conformance.

tasks.description: Facilitate the discussion among the engineers as they analyze the deviation's impact on the part's form, fit, and function.
Document the MRB's final disposition (e.g., 'Use As Is') and sign off on the NCR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent records the board's official decision and closes the NCR.
